meanings.definition: In a physically or mentally exhausting manner
meanings.sent1: She worked gruellingly all day under the scorching sun.
meanings.sent2: The athletes trained gruellingly for the upcoming competition.
meanings.sent3: The students groaned gruellingly when they saw the long assignment.
meanings.sent4: The journey through the dense forest was gruellingly challenging.
meanings.sent5: The mountain climb was gruellingly tough, testing their limits.

meanings.definition: In a way that requires great effort and endurance
meanings.sent1: He gruellingly carried the heavy boxes up the stairs.
meanings.sent2: The workers gruellingly completed the construction project on time.
meanings.sent3: The chef gruellingly prepared the elaborate meal for the guests.
meanings.sent4: The marathon runners pushed gruellingly towards the finish line.
meanings.sent5: The students studied gruellingly for the important exam.
